tasks.title: Add search head clustering (SHC) support
evidence: No search head clustering support exists in the current codebase.
Current cluster support is limited to indexer clustering.
Splunk REST API provides /services/shcluster endpoints for SHC management.
plan: Add SHC models (ShcMember, ShcStatus) to client.
Implement SHC status and member listing methods.
Add CLI shc command for viewing cluster status.
Create TUI SHC screen showing member status and captain info.
